scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development PORT=8000 REDIS_STORE_URI=redis://localhost:6379 REDIS_STORE_SECRET=secret TZ='America/Chicago' nodemon build/server.js
scripts.test: PORT=8001 REDIS_STORE_URI=redis://localhost:6379 REDIS_STORE_SECRET=secret TZ='America/Chicago' NODE_ENV=test mocha build/test -t 10000
